course_description: Students curate and defend a portfolio of revised work developed in the RWID Minor. Each portfolio will be introduced by a reflective essay that situates student work within the theoretical perspectives learned in the program. Prerequisite: Senior standing.
sections: Class Nbr: 3932, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 1-2:15p, Instructor: D. Morgen, Status: Open
